articles.title: American flags vandalized at South Boston memorials, sparking response from officials
articles.description:
Local veterans and elected officials held a meeting Wednesday at the Medal of Honor Park in response to the vandalism.

The post American flags vandalized at South Boston memorials, sparking response from officials appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: American flags vandalized at South Boston memorial
